messages.title: The Change We Need
messages.content: We need a government committed to protecting those essential services which allow communities to thrive and sectors of the economy away from the City of London that all matters.

messages.title: Fracking - Not the answer to climate change
messages.content: Urgent action is needed to tackle climate change and to end our reliance on dirty sources of energy. A Labour government will decarbonise the country's electricity by 2030, phasing out dirty coal and investing in low carbon energy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour government will decarbonise the country's electricity by 2030, phasing out dirty coal and investing in low carbon energy. Action against fracking.

mentions.tacticalSituation: At the last General Election, the Conservatives won here by just 333 votes.

issues.environment: Urgent action to end reliance on dirty sources of energy and decarbonise the country's electricity by 2030.

images.caption: Cat Smith, Labour candidate for Parliament
